description:
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at 25 CFSD Montreal 6363 Rue Notre Dame St E. Montreal, QC, H1N 3V9 by October 31, 2024.

Item 1, GSIN: 6830, NSN: 6830-01-698-1425, Calibrating Gas Mixture
Quantity: 150, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal 6363 Rue Notre Dame St E. Montreal, QC, H1N 3V9
Four (4) option periods of up to 150 per option.

Item 2, GSIN: 6830, NSN: 6830-01-698-1420, Calibrating Gas Mixture
Quantity: 100, Unit of Issue: Each, to be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal 6363 Rue Notre Dame St E. Montreal, QC, H1N 3V9
Four (4) option periods of up to 100 per option.

Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and/or model, Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
tags: Air or gas tanks or cylinders
full_summary:
================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number:** CB 202-95849277
* **Solicitation Number:** W8486-249636/A
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Publication Date:** May 8, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 29, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)

#### Procurement Summary

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the supply of calibrating gas mixtures. The contract is expected to be exercised from June 17, 2024, to March 31, 2025.

#### Items Required

The following items are required:

* Calibrating Gas Mixture (Item 1), GSIN: 6830, NSN: 6830-01-698-1425, Quantity: 150, Unit of Issue: Each
* Calibrating Gas Mixture (Item 2), GSIN: 6830, NSN: 6830-01-698-1420, Quantity: 100, Unit of Issue: Each

#### Delivery Requirements

Deliveries will be made to 25 CFSD Montreal, 6363 Rue Notre Dame St E., Montreal, QC H1N 2E9.

#### Bidder Requirements

Bidders must indicate brand name and/or model, part number, and NCAGE for any Equivalent or Substitute Product proposed.

#### Notice of Change

The Crown may negotiate with suppliers on any procurement under this contract.

Please submit your bids in either official language of Canada. For further questions or clarification, please contact:

* Pamela Horner, (343) 572-8721, [pamelahorner@forces.gc.ca](mailto:pamelahorner@forces.gc.ca)

#### Required Supporting Documents

Please refer to the links provided below for tender documents:

* En: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37646/w8486-249636a---solicitation-en.pdf>
* Fr: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37646/w8486-249636---mgd-amd001.pdf>
